definitions.definition: Serving as an ornament ; having no purpose other than to make more beautiful.
examples: Some think it most ornamental to wear their bracelets on their wrists; others, about their ankles.

definitions.definition: Bred for aesthetic or decorative purposes .
examples: Those pine trees on the lawn are the fastest-growing ornamentals we could find.

main_definition: Serving as an ornament ; having no purpose other than to make more beautiful.
secondary_definitions: ( of a plant, fish, etc. ) Bred for aesthetic or decorative purposes .
